GridDB Connection

Host Set the URL to GridDB Web API
Cluster Set the cluster name
User Set the GridDB user name
Password Set the GridDB password
Min time interval This is an optional setting. A lower limit for the time sampling interval. You need to consider the write frequency to set this property. For example if your write frequency is 1m, it may not have meaning to do time sampling with 1s If not input, no lower limit is used.
